features: Dustproof, HDMI, Interchangeable Lenses, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, red-eye reduction
label14: Wireless LAN and Ethernet support via optional Wireless Transmitter WT-4.
label0: 36.3 megapixel FX-format (full-frame) CMOS sensor with high signal-to-noise ratio, wide dynamic range and 12-channel readout.
label3: Multi-area D-Movie records FX- and DX-format Full HD (1080p) movies in 30p, 25p and 24p. Max recording time approx. 29 minutes 59 seconds. Offers uncompressed HDMI output to external devices and high-fidelity audio control.
label5: EXPEED 3 image processing engine with 14-bit A/D conversion and 16-bit image processing for superb tonal gradation.
label6: 8 cm (3.2-in.), 921k-dot LCD monitor with auto brightness control anti-reflective, with wide color reproduction.
attr3dcolormatrixmeteringiii: 91k pixel AE AF sensor with full-time face recognition.
